text: oba ayudha sulu pramanayakin yuktava sitiya vuvada kam næta, sampurna ayudha valin sannaddhava sitiya vuvada kam næta, oba (payin gamanin ho vahanayan mata nægi ho) pitatva gos, allahge margayehi obage vastunda, panada, puja kara yuddha karanu. oba dænuma ættavun vasayen sitinnehu nam, meyama obata itamat hondaya
